text: Daddy's Home is a 2015 American comedy movie directed and written by Sean Anders. It was produced by Will Ferrell and Adam McKay. It stars Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Linda Cardellini, Thomas Haden Church with John Cena. It was filmed in New Orleans, Louisiana, but the movie takes place in California. It was released to mixed reviews on December 25, 2015. It was rated M in Australia and New Zealand for violence, sexual references and offensive language. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:2015 movies Category:2010s comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies set in California
title: Daddy's Home (movie)
